articles.author: Kyle Feldscher
articles.title: The stage is set for Sunday drama at the US Open as Sam Burns leads Adam Scott and J.J. Spaun by one stroke - CNN
articles.description: It’s shaping up to be a dramatic Sunday at the US Open as American Sam Burns goes for his first major win and leads the field by one stroke, just ahead of Australian Adam Scott and his compatriot J.J. Spaun
articles.content:
Oakmont, PennsylvaniaCNN
  —
